title: Elon Musk alleges 'anticompetitive scheme' in xAI's Apple, OpenAI lawsuit
description: Elon Musk's xAI is suing Apple and OpenAI over alleged favoritism in artificial intelligence apps. It accused Apple and OpenAI of an "anticompetitive scheme" and alleged the two companies "colluded."
content: Monday's lawsuit filed in Texas by X and Elon Musk's (pictured in March at the White House in Washington, D.C.) xAI, an artificial intelligence startup he launched in 2023, accused Apple and OpenAI of an "anticompetitive scheme" and alleged the two "... [2201 chars]

title: Saudi's Humain to launch data centers with US chips in early 2026, Bloomberg News reports
description: Humain, Saudi Arabia's new artificial intelligence company, has begun construction of its first data centers in the kingdom, and plans to bring them online in early 2026 using semiconductors imported from the U.S., Bloomberg News reported on Monday.
content:
Tareq Amin, CEO of Humain, and Jensen Huang, CEO of NVIDIA, attend the Saudi-U.S. Investment Forum, in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia May 13, 2025. REUTERS/Hamad I Mohammed/File Photo Purchase Licensing Rights , opens new tab

title: Alphabet Stock Hits New All-Time High On AI, Cloud Momentum
description: Shares of Google parent Alphabet hit a new all-time high Monday. The stock is being buoyed by a string of positive developments in its artificial intelligence and cloud computing divisions.

title: Elon Musk Launches Antitrust Attack on Apple and OpenAI
description: Elon Musk has filed an antitrust lawsuit targeting Apple and OpenAI, accusing them of colluding to limit competition in artificial intelligence. The suit, filed by Musk's companies xAI and X Corp., alleges that Apple unfairly favored ChatGPT in its app store rankings, stifling rivals like Musk's Grok chatbot.
content:
In a bold legal move, Elon Musk has taken aim at Apple and OpenAI, filing an antitrust lawsuit that accuses the two tech giants of collaborating to dominate the artificial intelligence landscape.
Filed in Texas federal court, the lawsuit asserts that... [331 chars]

description: A study by University of Hawaiʻi researchers is advancing how we learn the laws that govern complex systems—from predator-prey relationships to traffic patterns in cities to how populations grow and shift—using artificial intelligence (AI) and physics.

title: Here’s how much money companies can save by using AI to replace human workers
description: Morgan Stanley did the math on how corporate adoption of artificial intelligence could affect businesses' bottom line—and the numbers are staggering.
content:
